text: Oxibꞌ qꞌij chik kꞌo ri Pablo pa Roma are xtaqan che kisikꞌixik ri kinimaꞌqil ri winaq aꞌj Israel ri e kꞌo pa Roma. Are xkimulij kibꞌ, ri Pablo xubꞌij chike: Qachalal, ri in man kꞌo ta jas jun kꞌax xinbꞌan chike ri qawinaqil aꞌj Israel, man kꞌo ta kꞌu nubꞌim chrij ri e naqꞌatal wi ri qamam ojer. Pune jeriꞌ xinokisax kꞌu pa cheꞌ pa ri tinimit Jerusalén, kꞌa te riꞌ xinjach loq pa kiqꞌabꞌ ri winaq aꞌj Roma.
